availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Swetnam (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Rebecca Swetnam. Father of Manoa Swetnam, Elizabeth Swetnam, Newton Swetnam, Laura Swetnam, America Swetnam, Nero Swetnam, Rosannah Swetnam, Nora Swetnam, Nora Swetnam, Harlan Swetnma, and William Swetnam. Farmer in Morgan County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, Division 2, p. 348.
Find A Grave, "John James Swetnam (1811-1898)," Memorial #112741203, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112741203 (accessed April 1, 2020).
